ygData.subject: Re: Old Question -- Has JM or anyone official ever answered it? Jig a nd Mana
ygData.msgSnippet: Myself and a wizard friend sat around and tested it with a few different tests.  We tested one bubble, 2 bubbles, and a OOM regen.  All of them were timed the
ygData.messageBody:
Myself and a wizard friend sat around and tested it with a few different
tests. We tested one bubble, 2 bubbles, and a OOM regen. All of them were
timed the same, the song seems to make no difference. We tested each 3
times, no song, song-no instrument, song-w/instrument.

Arithon
23 Bard
Erollisi Marr
>>Does the Jig really effect Mana regen rate? I still haven't been able to
do
>>any scientific experimentation, and I know that while this was discussed
>>pretty heavily a while back, I'm not sure I ever saw any sort of
definitive
>>answer come from it, just theories about stamina and meditation being on
the
>>same pulse rate.
>>
>>Anyone done any hard studies? Or did JM answer this in a post I missed
>>while on vacation?
>
>
>Well, the tests I have seen described were not very rigorous in the testing
process. For instance,
>testing the time to full up a bubble at the beginning against a bubble near
the end is not a good
>test. We don't know if there are variances in how the mana graphic is
displayed or if there are
>different regen rates at different levels. Anyway, I AM hoping to find the
definitive word on this,
>based on imperic evidence or just J.M.C.s word *smiles*
>
>Tszaaz
>
>
